mapper.insert: insert into DS_FLOW (ID, CATEGORYID, ALIAS, VNUM, DEPLOYID, NAME, STATUS, FLOWXML, DATATABLE, DATAVIEW) values (#{id}, #{categoryid}, LOWER(#{alias}), #{vnum}, null#{deployid}, #{name}, #{status}, #{flowxml}, #{datatable}, #{dataview})
mapper.delete: delete from DS_FLOW where ID=#{id} and (DEPLOYID is null or DEPLOYID='')
mapper.update: update DS_FLOW set DEPLOYID=#{deployid} where ID=#{id}
update DS_FLOW set NAME=#{name}, FLOWXML=#{flowxml}, DATATABLE=#{datatable}, DATAVIEW=#{dataview} where ID=#{id}
update DS_FLOW set STATUS=#{status} where ID=#{id} and DEPLOYID is not null
mapper.sql: ID, CATEGORYID, ALIAS, VNUM, DEPLOYID, NAME, STATUS, FLOWXML, DATATABLE, DATAVIEW

where.if: and (ALIAS like #{keyvalue, typeHandler=LikeTypeHandler} or NAME like #{keyvalue, typeHandler=LikeTypeHandler}

mapper.select: select from DS_FLOW where ALIAS=LOWER(#{alias}) and VNUM=0
